data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Nagpur, Maharashtra, India.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Nagpur, Maharashtra, India

data.prayer: There are 4,653,600 people living in the county of Nagpur. Only about 51,190 might be believers.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the county of Nagpur a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Nagpur.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Beldar Sunkar people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Beldar Sunkar people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Beldar Sunkar people is yours.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Nagpur, Maharashtra, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Nagpur, Maharashtra, India that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Nagpur, Maharashtra, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Nagpur
location.people_groups_list: Gond Sonjhari, Banjara Rathod (Hindu traditions), Kunbi Hindre, Kolowar, Bahrupi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Gond Sonjhari (48,000), Banjara Rathod (Hindu traditions) (421,000), Kunbi Hindre (19,000), Kolowar (240,000), Bahrupi (4,600)
